attributes.review: This app made MY PHONE SHUT DOWN FOR TEN DAYS!! My phone was completely unresponsive and once when I did get it running again it was glitching and nearly WIPED OUT ALL OF MY PHOTOS AND CONTACTS!! I was just trying to support 🍊 man, but this app ruined my experience 😔.

What a terrible app. It has zero purpose and if you read the fine print it wants to take your information and sell it to the Russians!!!! It made my phone glitch and restart out of no where! I HATE IT
attributes.title: HORRENDOUS

attributes.review: this app made my phone crash and i couldn't use it until the TWO days after i downloaded it. it almost ruined my phone and i am not pleased. trump 2020 but in a jail cell 💖
attributes.title: awful app DO NOT GET

attributes.review: I don’t like the app. Gives me weird vibes. And I noticed when I downloaded it my phone started going slow. If I could rate this app a 0 I would. Again would not recommend.
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! This app made my phone glitch so badly it was almost like a virus😪 then this big orange kept popping up and I started getting scared🥺 I was just trying to support the big orange god but things went wrong! Do not download it will ruin ur phone!!😪
attributes.title: TRUMPISORANGE

attributes.review: He is the worst  he is orange like he is and you can’t lie about it he is ruining our life so that is why btw he said he would make America great again but look what happens like man you got to keep your promises
attributes.title: Don’t vote for trump

attributes.review: This app is terrible and it took so long to download! I sat here for FIVE DAYS WAITING FOR IT! And there is some ORANGE FIGURE? Pretending to be Donald trump in a suit! Unacceptable, I am disgusted and this app is way to glitchy to run and it gave my phone a virus. I am beyond disgusted, and fed up with things like this. APP IS A SCAM AND ITS EXTREMELY GLITCHY!😡
attributes.title: GLITCHY

attributes.review: This app took 6 hours just too download. I wanted to get download this app to support my beautiful orange president✨. But immediately when I open the app it crashed and kept crashing. Very bad app. Please delete ✨🥴🤪
attributes.title: No✨

attributes.review: This app took hours to install and once it finally did it crashed multiple times and when I finally got it open it made an awful blaring sirens noise which burst my eardrum and make them bleed😻 😻😻
attributes.title: DEPLORABLE SERVICE

attributes.review: first of all I wanted to support my daddy Donald so I downloaded this app and it took HOURS to download AND it took 78GB to download 🤬🤬🤬also when I FINNALY opened the app trump minions jumped out and told me to vote for trump I was scared and ran downstairs and almost died because the minions threw an orange at me 😡😡😡ONE STAR REVIEW-Karen smith😇
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
